body:
Comment 3: 
Current docs say:

func (file *File) Readdirnames(count int) (names []string, err Error)

Readdirnames returns an array of up to count file names residing in the directory
associated with file. A negative count will return all of them. Readdir returns the
array and an Error, if any.

-------

Do you only want 0, os.EOF returned at the end of the stream of N > 0 calls, or can
Readdirnames(5) return (len([]string) == 4, os.EOF)?

Proposed new docs?
